announcements.title: üéâ New Version Available!
announcements.message: Version 99.0.0 brings exciting new features and improvements. Update now to enjoy the latest enhancements, or continue using the current version - it's up to you!

announcements.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Update Required
announcements.message: This update contains critical security fixes and must be installed to continue using the app. Please update now from the Play Store.

announcements.title: üîß Version 1.1.54: Critical Bug Fixes!
announcements.message: Important stability update! üõ†Ô∏è FIXED: Auto-save & History now persist correctly after app restart (no more lost preferences!), File history saving error resolved (unmodifiable list crash fixed), Notification auto-mark timing improved with 1-second delay. These fixes ensure your preferences, PDF theme, and last opened file are always preserved. Update now for a more reliable experience!

announcements.title: üíæ Preferences Now Persist After Restart
announcements.message: Fixed critical bug where PDF theme, last opened file, and history were lost after force-closing the app! The issue was caused by async preference loading not completing before the UI was built. Now all your preferences are properly loaded and preserved across app restarts. No more re-selecting your favorite theme every time!

announcements.title: üõ°Ô∏è History Saving Crash Fixed
announcements.message: Resolved 'Cannot remove from an unmodifiable list' error that occurred when auto-saving files. The file history service now creates mutable copies of lists, preventing crashes when adding or updating file history. Your document history will now save reliably every time!

announcements.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Better Notification Auto-Mark Timing
announcements.message: Notifications now wait 1 second before automatically marking as read when you expand them. This gives you time to actually read the announcement! The timer is properly canceled if you collapse the card before 1 second, preventing premature marking. Includes proper cleanup to prevent memory leaks.

announcements.title: üéâ Version 1.1.53: Smart Paragraph Breaking & Enhanced Selection!
announcements.message: Major productivity update! ‚ú® NEW: Auto-break long paragraphs with intelligent sentence detection (never worry about 'widget too tall' errors again!), Enhanced text selection on Android with 2x larger handles (44dp for easier selection), Smart error messages with one-click auto-fix, Better permission handling. Perfect for academic papers, research documents, and long-form content!

announcements.title: ‚úÇÔ∏è Auto-Break Long Paragraphs
announcements.message: Say goodbye to PDF generation errors! When a paragraph is too long to fit on one page, Owl.md now shows a helpful dialog with an 'Auto-Fix' button that intelligently breaks paragraphs at sentence boundaries. You can also use the new wrap icon (üìù) in the toolbar to proactively break long paragraphs before generating PDFs. Detects abbreviations (Dr., U.S.), preserves code blocks, lists, and tables. Perfect for academic papers, research documents, and long-form content!

announcements.title: üëÜ Better Text Selection on Android
announcements.message: Android users can now enjoy 2x larger selection handles (44dp vs 22dp) making it much easier to select text with your fingers! The enhanced handles have better touch targets (60dp touch area), smoother interactions, and theme-aware styling. No more struggling with tiny handles when editing on mobile!

announcements.title: üéâ Version 1.1.50: Major Update!
announcements.message: Huge update with professional features! ‚ú® NEW: Clickable links in PDFs, Image insertion (local & URLs), Auto Table of Contents, YAML frontmatter with title pages, Page numbers, BiDi/RTL support for Arabic, Enhanced formatting toolbar with indent/unindent, Improved split view animations. Plus: Bug fixes for link opening in preview and better code block rendering!

announcements.title: üîó Clickable Links in PDFs
announcements.message: All markdown links ([text](url)) are now clickable in your PDFs! Click any link in your PDF viewer to open it in your browser. Perfect for creating interactive documents, references, and documentation.

announcements.title: üñºÔ∏è Image Support
announcements.message: Embed images in your PDFs! Use ![alt](path) for local images or ![alt](https://url) for web images. Images are automatically downloaded and embedded. Supports PNG and JPG formats.

announcements.title: üìë Auto Table of Contents
announcements.message: PDFs now include an automatic Table of Contents generated from your headers (H1-H6)! The TOC appears at the start of your document with hierarchical indentation and clickable entries.

announcements.title: üìÑ YAML Frontmatter & Title Pages
announcements.message:
Add document metadata with YAML frontmatter! Use:
---
title: My Document
author: Your Name
date: 2025-12-16
version: 1.0
---

A beautiful title page will be automatically generated in your PDF!

announcements.title: üåç BiDi/RTL Support for Arabic
announcements.message: Full support for right-to-left (RTL) languages! Toggle RTL mode from the More Menu (‚ãÆ) for perfect Arabic text rendering in both preview and PDFs. Supports mixed Arabic-English text correctly.

announcements.title: Welcome to Owl.md! ü¶â
announcements.message: Thank you for choosing Owl.md - your markdown to PDF converter! We're excited to help you create beautiful PDFs from markdown. Check the announcements here for tips, updates, and new features!

announcements.title: üé® PDF Themes: Choose Your Style
announcements.message: Owl.md offers 4 professional PDF themes: Professional (Inter font, blue accents), Modern (Asap font, orange accents), Minimalist (Ubuntu font, black/gray), and Classic (Noto Serif, ivory background). Each theme is optimized for different document types!

announcements.title: ‚å®Ô∏è Formatting Toolbar
announcements.message: Use the formatting toolbar for quick access to: Bold, Italic, Headers, Code, Blockquotes, Lists, Tables, Callouts, Indent/Unindent, and more! The toolbar appears in edit mode on all screen sizes.

announcements.title: üì¶ Load from GitHub
announcements.message: Load markdown files directly from public GitHub repositories! Tap 'Quick Actions (‚ö°) ‚Üí Load from GitHub URL', paste any public GitHub markdown URL, and we'll fetch it for you. Only works with public repos!

announcements.title: üîí Privacy First
announcements.message: Owl.md doesn't collect any personal data, doesn't use analytics or tracking, and all your documents stay on your device. Works completely offline. No cloud sync, no data sharing - just pure privacy!

announcements.title: üìö User Guide
announcements.message: Want to learn all features? Tap 'More Menu (‚ãÆ) ‚Üí User Guide' to access the complete manual covering markdown syntax, PDF themes, tips & tricks, and troubleshooting!

announcements.title: üí¨ Need Help?
announcements.message: Have questions or feedback? Tap 'More Menu (‚ãÆ)' to report bugs, request features, or get help. You can also email us at support@injazapps.com anytime!
